channel.title: PerfectionX-server that developers get paid!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/i6b0y9.jpg[/img][/center] [hr] Hello everyone, my name is [b]Prototype[/b]. I would like to bring forward to the community a new RSPS, [b]PerfectionX[/b]. As you can tell by the title we are aiming for this server to be [b]perfect[/b]. Originally [b]PerfectionX[/b], was not going to be released. This was as it was a project for me to learn from, but it is turning and '[b]perfectly[/b]'. I have managed to obtain a hoster, so at the movement the beta's going to be released next week. Hopefully, the full server would be released a few days before Christmas. We are going to make it Christmas related for December but then we are going to start on the hard stuff.
[b]By hard stuff I mean:[/b] [ul][li]Summoning[/li] [li]construction[/li] [li]Dungeenering[/li] [li]hunter[/li] [li]full screen[/li] [li]all bosses[/li][/ul]
[hr] Here are some things about the server:
[b]What base have used for PerfectionX?[/b] We have used a blank PI source, hopefully it will be '[b]unique[/b]'. [b]What is PerfectionX?[/b] It's the [b]perfect[/b] RSPS. [b]What would we like to have in the server in the short term?[/b] GWD,other dungeons, all bosses, claws,vls,stat, other weps,custom Armour, clan wars,jad,pits and other mini-games,perfection points. [b]How many people do we want playing?[/b] 1500 <- BIG <- BIG <- BIG <- BIG [b]How are we going to achieve this?[/b] Top-lists,web-client,advertisement and some thing secret shhhhh.... [b]What do we want to achieve from the server?[/b] Personally I would like to achieve many types of accomplishments. I would like to have the following: [ul][li]Perfect economy;[/li] [li]fully working summoning;[/li] [li]fully working construction;[/li] [li]fully working dungeenering(first ever);[/li] [li]all quests from the real RS.[/li] [li]all the minigames[/li] [li]all the new bosses[/li][/ul]
[hr] Now my friends i want to notify you about one thing we as a community can, we can make this work. My friends, you will soon see us at the top of all. At the moment what we have in-terms of skills(Red= not started,Orange= on the way, Green= finished) : Attack Magic Thieving Smithing Dungeenering Strength Rune-crafting Crafting Fishing Construction Defense Hit-points Fletching Fire-making summoning Range Agility Slayer Woodcutting Prayer Mining Farming Herblore [hr] Ok what we are looking for is: server Coders Web designer Webclient maker client coders beta testers [hr] Terms: If your would like to apply please make sure that you are dedicated, we do not want people that will leave after a day. Also make sure that you are kind of mature and you do not fight with other people, we do not want fights between staff members. All developers will have a custom green crown just like the administrates one but in green. [code]Name: Timezone: Job wanted: Any past experience? Why you chose PerfectionX? By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: [/code] [hr] [b]I will post your application status HERE please check here regularly:[/b] [hr] [b]ACCEPTED and Ali Eid maborak![/b]
Name: Ali Timezone: Standard time zone: UTC/GMT -5 hours Time zone abbreviation: EST - Eastern Standard Time Job wanted: Coder (server) Any past experience? Yeah made a server Why you chose PerfectionX? This server looks like its going to become on top!:) By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: yes
[hr] [b]ACCEPTED please PM me you msn[/b]
Name: Kane Timezone: Central Job wanted: Server coder, Client coder, or Beta tester Any past experience? A few years Why you chose PerfectionX? Looks cool By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Yes
[hr] [b]ACCEPTED Soul is our head coder gratz = )[/b] [quote="Ix Soulcist xI"][b]I didn't know I was suppose to make one.[/b] Name: James Hernandez Timezone: Eastern Standard Time Job wanted: Server Coder Any past experience? Yes Why you chose PerfectionX? I was chosen instead of me being chosen. By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Yes[/quote] [hr] [b]PENDING- haven't talked to u yet on msn[/b] [quote="ii bandos ii"][b][i][font=comic sans ms][size=14pt]Want me to be your hoster?[/size][/font][/i][/b][/quote] [hr] [b]PENDING- need more information[/b]
Name: Abdul Timezone: GMT/London Job wanted: Web desinger Any past experience? 3 month Why you chose PerfectionX? becuase it sound cool By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Yes
[hr] [b]ACCEPTED[/b]
Hello. My name is Jacob and I am 14. Here is my application. Timezone: Eastern Time Zone Job wanted: Beta Tester or/and Website Designer Any past experience? I have been Beta test multiple times and I hate my own website. Here is the link to it. http://dietscape.net Why you chose PerfectionX? I think this server can get big. It has good goals that might be able to be completed. By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Yes The site that I said, I can make a site just like that of you want.
[hr]

item.title: PerfectionX-server that developers get paid!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

deathschaos9:

You need to post some proof of development. I.e. pictures, videos, etc.

You’ve had plenty of time.

Read full topic

[quote=“Sabhansali, post:25, topic:368847”]Name:Siddharth Timezone:Pacific (US) Job wanted: Beta Tester Any past experience? Yes, I have had my own server once Why you chose PerfectionX? Well, most other teams had requirements that I did not meet, but I met these requirements. Also I think this server will be really good! By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: yes
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/quote]

We would need to talk further

Timezone: Eastern Standard
Job wanted: I don’t mind, any position that is needed
past experience? I have had multiple experiences with setting up servers, but none of them got real big.
Why you chose PerfectionX? I thought i might become a part of something that has potential
By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: yes
[/quote]

Hi will pm you and ask for more details on there.[/quote]
Ok thank you for your time.

item.title: PerfectionX-server that developers get paid!
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote="† Kane †, post:6, topic:368847"]Name: Kane
Timezone: Central
Job wanted: Server coder, Client coder, or Beta tester
Any past experience? A few years
Why you chose PerfectionX? Looks cool
By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Yes[/quote]

[Rant]
I like how applications such as this ^^ were accepted and they have NO thought put into them whatsoever. 1-2 word answers? In my opinion this will fail because of the lack of effort put in by the dev team. Applicants should elaborate on their experience, and not just say that “It looks cool.”, give a legit reason please?
[/Rant]

Read full topic
